Little productivity hack for my writer friends.

For 5-years I‚Äôve tested every productivity hack in existence. 

Here‚Äôs what actually works: 

+ 90-minute work blocks 
+ 4-5 hours of work/day 
+ In between work blocks, do something that energizes you 

And set clear boundaries & goals.

Productivity is simplicity.

90% of people don't need another morning routine, productivity hack or self-help book

I can guarantee there's 1 or 2 mental blocks holding you back from being your most successful self

Find that block and everything else will start to fall into place

Good luck

15-minute productivity hack:

First 5: 
Write down EVERYTHING in your head.

Second 5:
Cross off ALL of the items you have no control over.

Third 5:
Order what's left in terms of importance.

Now what?

No multi-tasking allowed.
Get to work crossing them off one at a time.
